title: Mother Before Wife
description: Secrets. So many secrets. Nothing but secrets.I started another life with a new husband, thirteen new sister wives and a new place to call home.But the secrets weigh on me, on all of us.And every secret leads back to the Prophet the, self-proclaimed, mouthpiece of God.The man I’ve worshiped since childhood, the man we obey without question.And he’s the man who will destroy us all.I must reveal his secrets. Prove his betrayal, his lies and his deceit.I will not be silenced, no matter how hard he tries.And I will never give up. Ever.
author: Melissa  Brown
